content.text: An Inventory Shortages Report provides a quick review of which parts need to be ordered.
1. Navigate to Reports > Inventory > Inventory Shortages.
2. Below are the available report criteria, make the appropriate selections using the drop down menu for each field
Available report criteria: Warehouse - Select which warehouse to populate the shortages report for. Preferred Vendor (optional) - Use this field to generate inventory shortages per vendor.
The report populates based on selected criteria and is displayed above the report and is now available to be exported:
To change any of the report criteria, select Edit Criteria
An Inventory Valuation Report shows the total value of the parts on hand.
1. Navigate to Reports > Inventory > Inventory Valuation.
2. Below are the available report criteria, make the appropriate selections using the drop down menu for each field

Available report criteria: Valuation As Of - Select a date to generate Inventory Valuation from. Warehouse - Select which warehouse to populate the valuation report for. Show Part Detail - Provides a detailed list of Parts.
The report populates based on selected criteria and is displayed above the report and is now available to be exported:
To change any of the report criteria, select Edit Criteria
